WorkItem.Description:
Hello!

Any chance of a standalone, strongly typed DLL that can be referenced by projects that wish to use your functionality on a manual call basis?  For example I've got a custom CSS and JavaScript handler in my MVC3 project but not all team members have or want to install the Chirpy VS Addin, so we'd love a NuGet package for Visual Studio so that we can manually call a particular TransformEngine with specified settings whenever we want.


Cheers!
